title: Hour 2 - Nick Wright (04-02-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Nick Wright (04-02-20)
description:
'The Odd Couple' Chris Broussard and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Dannettes, and the guys discuss why Cam Newton can't seem to find a job in the NFL right now and explain why the NBA has to do whatever they can to finish the regular season before jumping into the playoffs. Plus, 'First Things First' on FS1 host Nick Wright stops by to explain why he thinks Newton is a better quarterback than Tom Brady right now and why he has an issue with some of the Michael Jordan sycophants across the country. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
